Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate how the string telephone connects two students to enable communication over a distance.
The student can show within the drawing how the telephone uses sound to send and receive information.
The student can depict only the provided materials used in constructing the string telephone.
The student can include labels or notes showing how the scientific concept of sound is used in their design.
The student can demonstrate the practicality of the design by showing people benefiting from the communication device.
